long_description: The Yakima Boat Loader telescoping load-assist arm helps you load your boat on your car's rooftop and retracts into your Yakima crossbar when not in use. Intuitive design helps keep the boat away from the car to help protect kayaks, canoes-and your car-from dings, scratches. Especially handy for one-person boat loading and unloading; useful on sedans and tall vehicles. Fits Yakima crossbars only.
short_description: The Yakima Boat Loader telescoping load-assist arm helps you load your boat on your car's rooftop and retracts into your Yakima crossbar when not in use.
